source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: How To Negotiate Optimum Outcomes Every Time
items.headline: Learn the simple, yet powerful process I use to achieve optimal outcomes in EVERY negotiation and how you can too!
objectives_summary: * You'll learn to breakaway from the traditional mindset and revolutionize your approach
* You’ll learn how to understand what others really want - not just what they say
* You’ll learn how to get others to understand and appreciate what’s most important to you

items.title: Management For The New Managers
items.headline: New to management? Want to be successful in your new role? Make a smooth transition? This course is a must for you.
objectives_summary: Make a smooth transition from a worker to a manager, perform basic management functions effeciently and effectively, deal with the information overload, develop the skill for rational decision making, understand why innovation and change matters and know what it takes to become a successful manager and where you stand!

items.title: Management Skills for Success and Employee Relations
items.headline: A guide to better leadership and employees motivational skills
objectives_summary: practice better management techniques and skills and interact more efficiently with their peers and employees

items.title: Cross Cultural Leadership
items.headline: Deep dive into Cross Cultural Leadership
objectives_summary: The Foundations of Cross Cultural Leadership
Profiling, the first competency
High Context and Low Context Cultures

items.title: Self-Organized Teams
items.headline: Learn what self-organization is & gain practical tools to implement it into your team or organization
objectives_summary: What differentiates self-organized teams from traditional teams
Why self-organizing teams are suited to deal with today’s complex, fast-paced world by staying agile and innovative
What a post-hierarchical organization is and how to build self-organized structures

items.title: Contracts Bottom Line, Claims Universe & Disputes Resolution
items.headline: Two Rules of Thumb; Contracts must be read before signing it & Contracts must be read as a Whole!
objectives_summary: Contracting Fundamentals from scratch to intermediate level, or even a little further!
Contract Administration, Anatomy of A Contract, Claims Universe, & Disputes Resolution Methods

items.title: Advanced Management Skills

visible_instructors.name: LearnSmart
visible_instructors.job_title: Smarter Training. Never Open a Textbook.
visible_instructors.title: LearnSmart LLC

items.headline: Progess towards the next step in effective management.
objectives_summary: By further enhancing your management skills, you will go on to lead a much healthier and productive team that fully cooperates with each other.
Your newly acquired skill-set will enable you to become a better leader, communicator and motivator whilst developing stronger professional relations
This course qualifies for 5.00 PDU credit hours toward the PMP® certification from PMI.org

items.title: Team Building: New Strategies for Developing Effective Teams
items.headline: Attention: Team Leaders, Now there's a faster, easier way to make all your workplace Teamwork much more successful!
objectives_summary: Understand the value of working as a team
Develop team norms, ground rules, and team contracts
Identify your team player style and how it can be used effectively with your own team

items.title: CIPS Level 4 Diploma: Commercial Negotiation (L4M5)

visible_instructors.display_name: Pavan Sharma, BE, MBA, MCIPS, Chartered Procurement Professional
visible_instructors.name: Pavan
visible_instructors.job_title: Director, Advance SCS, Singapore (Approved Centre of CIPS)
visible_instructors.title: Pavan Sharma, BE, MBA, MCIPS, Chartered Procurement Professional

items.headline: Be Prepared! Make use of the Practice Paper to test your preparation  for the CIPS Exams.
objectives_summary: Take the practice test for the CIPS L4M5 exams
Learn from someone who has completed the CIPS Professional Diploma
Gain confidence to successfully pass the CIPS  L4M5 Commercial Negotiation exams

label.display_name: CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply
label.title: CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply

items.title: Requests For Proposal Process
items.headline: How Craft An Efficient and Effective RFP
objectives_summary: How craft and issue a complete and viable RFP package that will deliver the required result.
At the end of this course you will be able to explain the 4 different type of request used in Supply Management
Upon completion of this course you will to familiar with the use and how apply the RSR analysis

items.title: Agile Scrum Fundamentals + Scrum Master Exam prep
items.headline: This course provides you with a complete understanding of how Scrum works and how to get a scrum master certification
objectives_summary: What is Scrum
Traditional Waterfall model and its limitations
Scrum roles, Scrum Artifacts, Scrum Events, Scrum Development and Scrum Matrices

items.title: How to Hire the Right People for the Right Jobs

visible_instructors.job_title: Job Interview Trainer | Career Coach | Founder & President
visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.title: Jessica Stuart

items.headline: A Manager's Guide to Hiring Quality Personnel
objectives_summary: This program provides the training, tools and resources needed to improve your hiring skills. It covers both technical and soft skills training and it connects hiring managers to their Human Resource (HR) departments to achieve the best possible outcome for the company. Also, the materials are helpful for small businesses looking to develop their HR hiring processes.

items.title: Minutes of a meeting Basic Intro Course
items.headline: Learn to conduct minutes of a meeting and agenda with free minutes of meeting samples
objectives_summary: How and why we conduct minutes of a meeting
Taking minutes in a meeting
Understanding the concept of taking minutes at meetings

items.title: Writing an Effective and Successful Business Plan
items.headline: Learn to write an effective business plan for your small business or start up in 30 short minutes.
objectives_summary: What a business plan is and why you need one.
How to write a successful and effective business plan from start to finish.
What financial data to include in your business plan with financial sheet examples.

items.title: IGNITE the Change Agent Within

visible_instructors.name: Astrapto
visible_instructors.job_title: Shedding light on social and environmental issues
visible_instructors.title: Astrapto Academy

items.headline: How to Overcome Common Objections to Sustainability and Other Significant Shifts
objectives_summary: Identify common objections to sustainability proposals.
Recognize the real reason people reject sustainability initiatives.
Practice leadership strategies to overcome resistance to change and sustainability.

items.title: Management in the Modern World: Management tips for Managers
items.headline: Build Management Skills to help to your career and Management Skills to the next level
objectives_summary: The role of a manager in a modern context
Practical steps to improve their management skills
How to take their career to the next level
